title: Interview With President Trump (Ep 1509)
description:
In this episode, I interview President Donald Trump about the Maricopa County election audit, the stunning new FISA Court revelations, the CNN tapes, his life post-presidency, and his plans for 2024. 

News Picks:


Stunning new revelations about FISA court abuses.


Woke companies are going to destroy their brands, and investors are waking up. 


Joy Reid’s latest revelation could be mistaken for a mental illness.


What is going on with the 2020 census numbers?
